mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device_jig_order_detail ( order_key, object_type, device_type_id, model_name, system_code, name, order_from, quantity, order_invoice_id, applicator_id, nesssary_reason, applicate_date, quotation_id, reorder_scheduled_date, recept_date, confirm_flg, confirm_quantity, inline_recept_date, inline_receptor_id, budget_month, budget_description, invoice_no, invoice_date ) VALUES ( #{order_key}, #{object_type}, #{device_type_id}, #{model_name}, #{system_code}, #{name}, #{order_from}, #{quantity}, #{order_invoice_id}, #{applicator_id}, #{nesssary_reason}, #{applicate_date}, #{quotation_id}, #{reorder_scheduled_date}, #{recept_date}, #{confirm_flg}, #{confirm_quantity}, #{inline_recept_date}, #{inline_receptor_id}, #{budget_month}, #{budget_description}, #{invoice_no}, #{invoice_date} )
mapper.select: SELECT object_type, device_type_id, device_type_name, model_name, send_date FROM ( SELECT device_jig_order_detail.object_type, device_jig_order_detail.device_type_id, device_type.name AS device_type_name, device_jig_order_detail.model_name, device_jig_invoice.send_date, device_jig_order_detail.applicate_date FROM device_jig_order_detail LEFT JOIN device_jig_quotation ON device_jig_quotation.quotation_id = device_jig_order_detail.quotation_id LEFT JOIN device_type ON device_type.device_type_id = device_jig_order_detail.device_type_id LEFT JOIN device_jig_invoice ON device_jig_invoice.object_type = device_jig_order_detail.object_type AND device_jig_invoice.device_type_id = device_jig_order_detail.device_type_id AND device_jig_invoice.model_name = device_jig_order_detail.model_name WHERE device_jig_quotation.acquire_date IS NULL ORDER BY device_jig_invoice.send_date DESC ) a_invoice GROUP BY a_invoice.object_type, a_invoice.device_type_id, a_invoice.model_name ORDER BY applicate_date, model_name

SELECT device_jig_order.order_no, device_jig_order_detail.object_type, device_jig_order_detail.model_name, device_jig_order_detail.system_code, device_jig_order_detail.name, device_jig_order_detail.order_from, device_jig_order_detail.quantity, device_jig_invoice.order_price, device_jig_invoice.order_price * device_jig_order_detail.quantity AS total_order_price, device_jig_invoice.origin_price, device_jig_order_detail.order_key, device_jig_order_detail.device_type_id, device_jig_order_detail.applicator_id, device_jig_order_detail.applicate_date FROM device_jig_order_detail JOIN device_jig_order ON device_jig_order_detail.order_key = device_jig_order.order_key LEFT JOIN device_jig_invoice ON device_jig_invoice.invoice_id = device_jig_order_detail.order_invoice_id WHERE device_jig_order_detail.quotation_id IS NULL ORDER BY device_jig_order.order_no

SELECT order_key, object_type, device_type_id, model_name, system_code, name, order_from, quantity, order_invoice_id, applicator_id, nesssary_reason, applicate_date, quotation_id, reorder_scheduled_date, recept_date, confirm_flg, confirm_quantity, inline_recept_date, inline_receptor_id, budget_month, budget_description FROM device_jig_order_detail WHERE order_key = #{order_key} AND object_type = #{object_type} AND device_type_id = #{device_type_id} AND model_name = #{model_name} AND applicator_id = #{applicator_id}

SELECT device_jig_order_detail.applicate_date, operator.name AS applicator_operator_name, device_jig_order_detail.name, device_jig_order_detail.model_name, device_jig_order_detail.quantity, device_jig_order_detail.nesssary_reason FROM device_jig_order_detail JOIN operator ON operator.operator_id = device_jig_order_detail.applicator_id WHERE device_jig_order_detail.quotation_id IS NULL AND device_jig_order_detail.order_key = #{order_key} AND device_jig_order_detail.order_from = #{order_from}

SELECT device_jig_order_detail.name, device_jig_order_detail.model_name, device_jig_order_detail.quantity, device_jig_invoice.order_price FROM device_jig_order_detail LEFT JOIN device_jig_invoice ON device_jig_invoice.invoice_id = device_jig_order_detail.order_invoice_id WHERE device_jig_order_detail.confirm_flg IS NULL AND device_jig_order_detail.order_key = #{order_key} AND device_jig_order_detail.order_from = #{order_from}
